high_descs: Move to your left and walk up to the left hand side of the sofa where the laptop is sitting.
Close the laptop that is on the couch and pick it up.
Move to the small table that is to the left of the sofa.
Turn on the lamp that is on the small table.
anns.task_desc: Inspect a laptop by the light of the lamp.

high_descs: Go left and face the computer that is open on the couch.
Close the computer and pick it up from the couch.
Move to the left and face the small table with the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Turn a lamp on with a computer in hand.

high_descs: Move to the left side of the large tan sofa
Pick up the laptop that is sitting on top of the sofa
Carry the laptop to the brown side table to the left of the sofa
Turn the lamp on that is on top of the table
anns.task_desc: Move a laptop while turning on a lamp
